alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 09 at 1:52PM CST until March 10 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Blue River near Blue affecting Bryan County.
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC013-100800- /O.CON.KOUN.FL.Y.0005.000000T0000Z-230310T1800Z/ /BLUO2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 152 PM CST Thu Mar 9 2023 ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Blue River near Blue. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The river remains largely within its banks... throughout Bryan County. Inflows from local streams could cause minor overflows to reach very low fields for a short while. Only farmlands are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 26.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to rise to 27.0 feet this evening and then begin falling late tonight. - Action stage is 26.0 feet. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
